mapper.update:
update member
no = #{no,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nick_name = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
age = #{age,jdbcType=TINYINT},
tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
height = #{height,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
weight = #{weight,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where mem_Id = #{memId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update member set no = #{no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nick_name = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=TINYINT}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, height = #{height,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, weight = #{weight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where mem_Id = #{memId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
